head.title: Learn and Practice a language in an environment of total relaxation

title_1: The best way to learn or practice a lenguage
subtitle: Games, Technology, Works, Interviews talk and practice with the topic that you feel comfortable with.

how_section.title: How do we do it?
how_section.description_section: When you like the topic of conversation, you speak more easily, that's why we gather people who are interested in the same topic of conversation... have a good time

section_1.title: We create random groups
section_1.description: For each session we create random groups, that way you practice your language with different people, that way you loosen up a bit and meet new friends.

section_2.title: Short Sessions
section_2.description: Just 30 min a day is enough to practice, plus we know you have more to do.

section_3.title: Relaxation and fun
section_3.description: The great thing is that you will talk about what you like the most, be it video games or religion.

section_4.title: One more way to learn
section_4.description: We believe that it is important that this is one more tool to learn a language, therefore it does not replace good classes with specialized teachers.

us_section.title: A bit of us
us_section.description: We are a group of young people eager to get to know the world, people and cultures, but to have a better experience, speaking a global language is necessary. We know that it is super important to have foreign language classes, learn grammar and more, but earn more practice and talk about your tastes with random people but with your same interests and level.

call_actions.cta_yellow: A social method that does work

blog.title: Shots
blog.description: Little shots to help you learn

head.title: Shots - FlashCards for learning
head.description: A good way to learn is to dedicate at least 30 minutes a day to speak, read or listen to the language, but it is also a good idea to read small Shorts / Blogs with completely necessary information.

duolingo.description: In short, while Duolingo is an excellent choice for learning new vocabulary and as a complementary game, it is also a great way to learn new vocabulary.
